DOC.brief_summary: A study with YM155 for the treatment of unresectable stage III or metastatic stage IV melanoma.
DOC.brief_title: A Study for the Treatment of Unresectable Stage III or Metastatic Stage IV Melanoma
DOC.detailed_description: A phase II, multicenter, open-label study in subjects with unresectable Stage III or metastatic (Stage IV) Melanoma to evaluate the efficacy and safety of YM155
DOC.criteria: Histologically or cytologically confirmed unresectable stage III or IV malignant melanoma Life expectancy >12 weeks History of other malignancy in the last 5 years Major surgery within the past 21 days
